author: BBC News
title: Ex-police officers guilty in George Floyd death
description: Tou Thao, J Alexander Kueng and Thomas Lane were convicted of denying George Floyd his civil rights.
content:
Three ex-Minneapolis policemen present at the death of George Floyd denied the unarmed black man of his civil rights, a jury has found.
